column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Everything was great. The shrimp cocktail was fresh and came with a number of different sauces. We got two crab cakes - a great decision as it was too good to be satisfied with one. Our sides included wild mushrooms
column2: Brussels sprouts and fries with garlic aioli (some of the best damn fries out there). For the main course
column3: I went with the dry aged bone in rib eye. It was delicious
column4: but given the apps and sides that preceded the main course
column5: I couldn't finish the whole thing.
